name: Strong Ventures
overview: Strong Ventures is a seed investment fund and startup accelerator that funds and mentors young entrepreneurs as they build their businesses into strong ventures. The founders of Strong Ventures have learned from their startup experiences that money is only one of the many ingredients to a ventureâ€™s success. We believe that the key ingredient lies in the hands-on knowledge transfer and mentoring at every stage of the startup lifecycle, and that every entrepreneur can do better with some of our mentoring. Together, with our experience and expertise, our goal is to identify, invest and advise early stage startups with the potential to disrupt the global market. Due to our background and experience, we are currently focused on supporting young Korean and American entrepreneurs interested in building successful, strong global ventures.
